name: Salty Snake
description:
Week 1 of the Salty Studios Game Dev Co. (SSGDC) game development challenge! We're aiming to each develop 1 concept per week, with a given objective. This weeks objective was Snake 🐍

I've opted for a largely traditional approach, with a slight twist - This Snake Got Legs. Press space and reach for space!

Give it a go and show us your high scores below!
